public class ReadConfig
extends Config

This class is called at the startup of tomcat and load all configuration on the the Capture App.

OBSOLETE: see ConfigureManager.get() Gets the list of Vocabulary Entries corresponding to incoming filter parameters QueryParam|] params Possible filter parameters include:
  • type : Filter by Vocabulary type, e.g. urn:epcglobal:epcis:vtype:BusinessLocation

  • attribute: Filter by VocabularyElement attribute, e.g. urn:epcglobal:cbv:mda:sslt:210
